seo.title: Cinque Terre Camping 2025 | Campsites & Budget Accommodation
seo.description: Find the best campsites near Cinque Terre. Budget-friendly camping with beach access, facilities, and convenient locations in Levanto and Monterosso.

body.title: Camping near Cinque Terre
body.subtitle: Affordable campsites with beach access, modern facilities, and easy connections to all five villages in Levanto and nearby areas

features.title: Budget-Friendly
features.description: Most affordable accommodation option, especially for families and longer stays during peak season

features.title: Levanto Campsites
features.description: Several well-equipped campsites in nearby Levanto, just one train stop from Monterosso

features.title: Beach Access
features.description: Many campsites have direct beach access or are within walking distance of sandy beaches

features.title: Modern Facilities
features.description: Clean bathrooms, hot showers, electrical hookups, WiFi, restaurants, and swimming pools

features.title: Easy Train Access
features.description: Convenient train stations nearby for exploring all five villages throughout the day

features.title: Nature Setting
features.description: Shaded sites with olive and pine trees, peaceful atmosphere away from tourist crowds

body.title: Compare Accommodation Options
body.description: Explore hotels, apartments, agriturismi, and other stays for your Cinque Terre visit
